error.wrong_version: Your powerwall uses a software version that is not supported. Please consider upgrading or reporting this issue so it can be resolved.

reauth_confim.description: The password is usually the last 5 characters of the serial number for Backup Gateway and can be found in the Tesla app or the last 5 characters of the password found inside the door for Backup Gateway 2.
reauth_confim.title: Reauthenticate the powerwall

user.description: The password is usually the last 5 characters of the serial number for Backup Gateway and can be found in the Tesla app or the last 5 characters of the password found inside the door for Backup Gateway 2.
user.title: Connect to the powerwall
